REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2692 reute s f BC-DURAKON-<DRKN.O>-TO-M 10-19 0050

TEXT.TITLE: DURAKON <DRKN.O> TO MAKE ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Durakon Industries Inc said it has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire DFM Corp, a maker of bug and gravel protective shields for trucks and cars, for an undisclosed amount of cash and debentures, retroactive to September One. Reuter
